content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

#### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (15.5, 70.5)
- **Electric mining drill** at (15.5, 70.5) (no power)
- **Burner inserter** at (13.5, 70.5) (fueled, waiting for source)
- **Transport belt network** (blocked at 15.5,72.5)
- **Stone furnace** at (30.0, 74.0) (fueled, smelting iron plates)
- **Wooden chest** at (28.5, 74.5) (empty)

#### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-46.5, 70.5)
- **Electric mining drill** at (-46.5, 70.5) (no power, connected to pole at -46.5,68.5)
- **Burner inserter** at (-44.5, 70.5) (fueled, waiting for source)
- **Transport belt network** (active)
- **Stone furnace** at (30.0, 80.0) (fueled, smelting copper plates)
- **Wooden chest** at (-46.5, 74.5) (empty)

#### Power Generation Setup at (-21.5, 70.5)
- **Offshore pump** at (-20.5, 69.5) (working)
- **Boiler** at (-17.5, 69.0) (fueled, full output)
- **Steam engine** at (-25.5, 89.5) (working)
- **Pipe network** (fluid system 2016 for steam)

#### New Power Generation Setup at (-9.5, -0.5)
- **Offshore pump** at (-9.5, -0.5) (not connected)
- **Boiler** at (-6.0, 1.5) (not connected)
- **Steam engine** at (-4.5, 6.5) (not connected)

#### Coal Mining Setup at (16.0, 0.0)
- **Burner mining drill** at (16.0, 0.0) (fueled)
- **Temporary burner inserter** at (-44.5, 70.5) (fueled)

### ERROR TIPS

#### Placement Collision Issues (5 new instances)
- Verify target position is clear before placing wooden chests (failed at -46.5,72.5 and -45.5,70.5)
- Check for existing entities before placing burner inserters (failed at -46.5,68.5, -46.5,69.5, and -46.0,70.5)
- Remove existing entities or choose different positions for placement attempts

#### Water Placement Errors (1 new instance)
- Verify mining drill placement avoids water tiles (failed at -20.0,0.0)
- Implement water detection before placement attempts

#### Entity Retrieval Errors (2 new instances)
- Verify entity exists before attempting retrieval (failed for electric mining drill at 15.5,70.5 and wooden chest at 16.5,68.5)
- Add existence checks before get_entity calls

#### Existing Issues (from previous report)
- Clear backed-up transport belts (iron belt at 15.5,72.5)
- Maintain fuel supply for all burner entities
- Verify inserter pickup/drop positions
- Check power pole placement covers all electrical entities
- Clear existing entities before placement attempts
- Verify power pole coverage includes all electrical entities
- Ensure proper pipe connections between offshore pumps and boilers

#### New Recommendations
- Implement position validation system before placement attempts
- Add water tile detection to placement routines
- Create entity existence verification before retrieval
- Develop automated collision detection for placement
- Standardize error handling for placement operations
